page.title: 02THE GREEK COMMUNITY
page.content: MOST OF THE GREEK FAMILIES CAME TO MARGATE FROM CYPRUS TO ESCAPE FROM THE WAR THERE.THE CHURCH WAS FOUNDED IN 1964 AND IS PAID FOR BY CONTRIBUTIONS FROM THE GREEK PEOPLE HERE.THE GREEKS RESTAURANTS,BOARDING HOUSES AND FAST FOOD SHOPS.THEIR CHILDREN GO TO STATE SCHOOLS BUT ABOUT 60 ATTEND DAILY LESSONS FROM 5 TO 7 PM.IN GREEK LANGUAGE,HISTORY AND GEOGRAPHY AT THE SCHOOL BESIDE THE CHURCH.FATHER ANTHIMOS IS BOTH PRIEST AND TEACHER.ON SPECIAL DAYS LIKE CHRISTMAS AND EASTER THE CHURCH HAS ABOUT 300 PEOPLE ATTENDING SERVICES.MOST OF THESE GREEKS INTEND TO STAY PERMANENTLY IN THANET BUT SEND THEIR CHILDREN TO THE GREEK SCHOOL TO KEEP THE GREEK CULTURE ALIVE.
